p: The calibration curve of each compound was established from at least six appropriate concentrations in triplicate by plotting the peak areas versus the concentrations. As can be seen in Table 2, all calibration curves showed optimized linearities with the average determination coefficient ( R 2) higher than 0.999. LOD values were determined between 0.4 to 6.6 μg/ml illustrating a high sensitivity of the analytical method that was sufficient to determine the contents of F. multiﬂora samples.
